title.rendered: The Enthralling Southern Crime Thriller ‘Dirt Road Reckoning’ by R.J. Shaw Is Here

content.rendered:
NEW YORK, NY, UNITED STATES, July 5, 2024 /EINPresswire.com/ — The latest literary masterpiece from bestselling author R.J. Shaw, “Dirt Road Reckoning,” is a captivating Southern Crime/Police Procedural novel that will attract readers with its realistic depiction of law enforcement and riveting storyline.

In “Dirt Road Reckoning,” a violent murder on a lonely running trail in the mountains of East Tennessee draws Sheriff Gus Wallace into the most dangerous case of his career. Wallace, a retired FBI Special Agent, questions the confession of a serial killer and unearths a network of corruption that reaches the highest echelons of the FBI as he digs into the investigation and finds disturbing parallels to previous murders.

“Dirt Road Reckoning” explores themes of justice and courage in the face of hardship and uses a David vs. Goliath story to explore the corrupting effects of blind ambition and the uncontrolled quest for power.

‘Dirt Road Reckoning’ is not just another crime novel. It’s a unique blend of thriller and police procedural that appeals to a wide range of readers, from seasoned thriller veterans to those who have never delved into this genre before. This novel promises to keep readers on the edge of their seats with its gripping storyline and authentic portrayal of the complexities of law enforcement.

“Sheriff Gus Wallace’s journey in ‘Dirt Road Reckoning’ is a testament to the enduring power of justice and the courage of those who fight for it,” according to bestselling author Mike Trigg. “R.J. Shaw has once again delivered a winner.”

IndieReader stated, “R.J. Shaw’s DIRT ROAD RECKONING promises a fast and compelling read with a twisty, textured plot, smoothly built developments, complex characters, and a heavy dose of humor.” (4.8 out of 5 Stars)

About R.J. Shaw

R.J. Shaw, a best-selling author and a former FBI Special Agent with over 30 years of experience, brings a unique perspective to his writing. His deep understanding of law enforcement, combined with his passion for storytelling, results in compelling narratives that are both authentic and suspenseful. Shaw’s earlier work, ‘Lies People Tell,’ was a testament to his literary prowess, winning numerous accolades and praise.

Grab your copy today from Amazon.

David Cooper
Woodbridge Publishers
+1 7183378849
email us here

You just read:

News Provided By

July 05, 2024, 16:37 GMT
